mapper.insert: insert into o2o.tb_goods_info (goods_name, goods_desc, goods_image_url, goods_priority, create_time, update_time, goods_category_id, goods_shop_id, status, goods_normal_price, goods_promotion_price) values (#{goodsName}, #{description}, #{imageURL}, #{priority}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{category.goodsCategoryId}, #{shopInfo.shopId}, #{status}, #{normalPrice}, #{promotionPrice})
mapper.select: select tginfo.*, tgimage.goods_image_id, tgimage.goods_image_url as url, tgimage.goods_image_desc, tgimage.goods_image_priority, tgc.goods_category_id, tgc.goods_category_name, tsi.shop_id, tsi.shop_name from o2o.tb_goods_info as tginfo left join o2o.tb_goods_image as tgimage on tginfo.goods_id = tgimage.goods_id left join o2o.tb_goods_category as tgc on tginfo.goods_category_id = tgc.goods_category_id inner join o2o.tb_shop_info as tsi on tginfo.goods_shop_id = tsi.shop_id where tginfo.goods_id = #{id}
